body_html:
With latest changes and local testing, I think the issue should have been resolved. I posted my code snippet below. Would you mind check it again before closing this ticket?
nasnet (with batch norm):
https://gist.github.com/tanzhenyu/48d705ba49acb0ff166da2db986745ef

@dhgrs, also note that in your code example mnist are 28 by 28, while nasnet mobile requires at least 32 by 32. I'm not sure how the code works without checking the size, that could be something mysterious; meanwhile rescale it by 1/255 is something I would do either)

body:
With latest changes and local testing, I think the issue should have been resolved. I posted my code snippet below. Would you mind check it again before closing this ticket?
nasnet (with batch norm):
https://gist.github.com/tanzhenyu/48d705ba49acb0ff166da2db986745ef

@dhgrs, also note that in your code example mnist are 28 by 28, while nasnet mobile requires at least 32 by 32. I'm not sure how the code works without checking the size, that could be something mysterious; meanwhile rescale it by 1/255 is something I would do either)
